channel.title: Hypixel - Minecraft Server and Maps
channel.description: Play award winning minecraft games and mini-games with your friends for free. Only on the Hypixel minecraft server!

item.title: Hypixel Mafia: Machine's Workshop #5012: Shifting Mafia
item.author: invalid@example.com (Skylaar)
item.dc:creator: Skylaar
item.content:encoded:
Hello, and welcome to

Experimental #5012 - Shifting Mafia

This game works exactly like a traditional game of mafia - but with one simple twist. Every night, the players on the mafia change, and are re-selected from the pool of alive players. This means that it is possible for the mafia kill to, yes, kill a member of the new mafia team. This will certainly be a chaotic game, so you best be prepared.

This game will feature 9 players - 7 town and 2 mafia.

Keep in mind - This is...

Read more

item.title: Rat Trap enchant (effort)
item.author: invalid@example.com (CorporateDisaster)
item.dc:creator: CorporateDisaster
item.content:encoded:
I don't know how to properly pitch this; here we go.

Rat Trap enchant. Drops from rats, which spawn in hub basements at night. 0.01% chance to drop, rarer that the rat pet. It drops and a level one enchant, and can be upgraded to level two. Rat Trap III has a 0.05% chance to drop from rats and cannot be obtained otherwise.

At level one, rat trap is like a better version of thorns. It does damage equal to your health, and if an enemy mob hits you with a melee attack it stuns them for one...

Read more

item.title: Why are people even allowed to sell gemstones to the NPC? (CONTROVERSIAL)
item.author: invalid@example.com (HyperionBetterThanAstraea)
item.dc:creator: HyperionBetterThanAstraea
item.content:encoded:
Ever since gemstones were introduced, it has always been the meta to sell to NPCs for more profit per gemstone than at the bazaar. However, this has resulted in massive inflation due to how profitable gemstone mining was. My question is: why was it even allowed in the first place?
1. Pristine is very overpowered
Admins designed this skill with the intent of making gemstone mining a viable moneymaking method. Why they didn't factor in NPC sell prices originally (base gemstones were...

Read more

item.title: [ rant ] dungeons is actually the epitome of bad game design
item.author: invalid@example.com (AngryFrosmoth)
item.dc:creator: AngryFrosmoth
item.content:encoded:
if admins set a cata 14 req for floor 5 then players should be able to do f5 with cata 14, albeit without fluency of course (this is regular game design). as you get a higher level, you should be able to do the floor with more fluency and speed.

under this prerequisite, given that
- carries are bad
- low cata is bad
- bad gear is, well, bad

how is a player supposed to legitimately complete his first dungeon run of a specific floor at the intended level, while trying to be 'good' according...

Read more

item.title: Creeper minions are actually overpowered.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Archer_Goes_Brrrr)
item.dc:creator: Archer_Goes_Brrrr
item.content:encoded:
I won't reveal my method on how to fire a gun at them, but just know they farm in an hour what slime minions make in a day.
It's also required to have blaze slayer 5 and f6 comp.

item.title: Why is large slayer sack at wolf slayer 8
item.author: invalid@example.com (Swankiestpants)
item.dc:creator: Swankiestpants
item.content:encoded:
Been doing slayers and notice my medium sack fills very quickly especially from Tara slayer, so I was looking into getting large and realized it's gated behind wolf slayer 8, why? Why is a simple QOL item gated behind such a huge grind? Especially with how slow it is to spawn a t4, killing him takes seconds but spawning him I'm at around 5-6 minutes per boss using an empty howling cave and a juju bow, it gives 500 exp normally and 625 with aatrox, to get lvl 8 you need 400k exp, that's...

Read more

item.title: About the slime minion setups
item.author: invalid@example.com (MDOfficial)
item.dc:creator: MDOfficial
item.content:encoded: I have been told to get minion expanders on the slime minions, but I'm wondering what that has to do with making more money. I discovered that the only useful thing about minion expanders is that they increase minion speed by 5%. Is that it? (Btw I am using a diamond spread instead of an expander just cause I have a boatload of them and idk if I should switch to expander)

item.title: Ranking the Wither Blades
item.author: invalid@example.com (FridgeRaider)
item.dc:creator: FridgeRaider
item.content:encoded:
If you have ever spent more than 30 minutes playing Skyblock on the Hypixel Network, you probably know that the four Wither Blades (technically five but the fifth is irrelevant) are very strong weapons, and are required for late game progression. It is sometimes debated which of these is the best of the four. Well, today, I am putting an end to these pointless arguments once and for all.

(images taken from wiki btw)
(swords are listed worst to best)
Hyperion

Now...

Read more

item.title: Official Weapons Tierlist!
item.author: invalid@example.com (MaxorBest)
item.dc:creator: MaxorBest
item.content:encoded:
This post will aim to clarify many of the nuisance differences between the countless choices of weapons.

S+ Tier
Daedalus Axe
Dark Claymore
Hyperion
Midas Staff
Terminator
Click to expand...
This was pretty self-explanatory in terms of DPS and overall versatility throughout the game.

Daedalus Axe will always be superior.

Dark Claymore is easily the best sword in the game (Claymore > Hyperion easily)

Hyperion is essentially a downgraded Midas Staff that’s only useful for its healing...

Read more

item.title: What makes us human?
item.author: invalid@example.com (PayPayPumps)
item.dc:creator: PayPayPumps
item.content:encoded: Title. All of you reading this post are humans. What would you say is the main thing that differs you from a non human?(like from a dog, a tree, a Leopard 2A7 etc.) Is it the way you think, the way your body is built or something else entirely?

item.title: Design Thread - Let's talk about 1.0
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jayavarmen)
item.dc:creator: Jayavarmen
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

While the 1.0 update is still far on the horizon due to the team working on other large updates at the moment, the design of 1.0 is currently reaching a critical point where we think we should sit with the community and have a good chat about it.

What is 1.0 exactly?
SkyBlock has been out for over 2 years in the prototype lobby. Over the course of its development we have been very bold with many of our decisions, we were not afraid to try dangerous ideas and changes.
Some of...

Read more

item.title: Recomb to Mythic achievement not working?

item.dc:creator: Breaddha
item.content:encoded: So I got a recomb while I was trying to level my cata up a little and decided to put it on my FoT for the two recombing achievements. I ended up only earning "Upgrades people, Upgrades!". Is "Mystical" bugged or are there other conditions behind it?

item.title: What do we need to keep this game alive?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wudze)
item.dc:creator: Wudze
item.content:encoded:
Actually UHC is in a really bad spot and has been for quite a while now, is this the end?

Ranked skywars got recently removed so maybe uhc is next on the list. What do we need to make this game become alive again?

Reason UHC had alot of players before was cause of the update and mostly because of the pandemic.

Would an update for UHC help?

item.title: Why did I get 6 ore from one block..

item.content:encoded: The pickaxe does not have fortune, mined ONE iron ore
